name: Jiri Tyr
body:
# Android apps
* [Currency Rates](http://jtyr.github.io/currencyrates)
* [LDAP Caller ID](http://jtyr.github.io/ldap-caller-id)

# Chrome extensions
* [Compact Gmail Chat](http://jtyr.github.io/compact-gmailchat)
* [Mouse Wheel Tilt History](http://jtyr.github.io/mouse-wheel-tilt-history)

# Monitoring
* [SNMP Extension Agent](http://jtyr.github.io/extagent)
* [Puppet module for the SNMP Extension Agent](http://jtyr.github.io/puppet-extagent)
* [IRC Tail](http://jtyr.github.io/irctail)

# Other projects
* [XML CV](http://jtyr.github.io/xmlcv)
* [XSLT Blog](http://jtyr.github.io/xslt-blog)
* [IVTV Player](http://jtyr.github.io/ivtvplayer)
